veteran.low_ammo: Captain, we're burning through ammo. Might want to think about conserving for the objective.
veteran.low_morale: The men are shaky, Captain. We need a win — something to steady them.
veteran.low_men: We're down to a handful, sir. Not enough for a proper assault. Maybe we find another way.
veteran.high_readiness: They're dug in now, sir. This won't be easy. We need to be smart about our approach.
veteran.time_surplus: We're ahead of schedule. Could use the time to scout the approach.
veteran.bad_decision_suicidal: With all due respect, sir — that's suicide. There has to be another way.
veteran.bad_decision_reckless: Sir, that's risky. Real risky. I'd want a better plan before committing the men.

green.low_ammo: Uh... we don't have a lot of bullets, sir.
green.low_morale: The guys seem pretty scared, sir.
green.low_men: There's... not many of us left, Captain.
green.high_readiness: Sounds like a lot of shooting up ahead, sir.
green.time_surplus: What do we do now, sir?

act1_the_patrol.patrol_l_ambush: Good position, sir. I'll take the second element. On your signal.
act1_the_patrol.patrol_linear_ambush: One-sided, sir? Better than nothing. But some'll get away down the bridge.
act1_the_patrol.patrol_knife: That's... optimistic, Captain. You knife one, the other three hear it.
act1_the_patrol.patrol_charge: Captain — you are not serious. A bayonet charge? Against four men with submachine guns?
act1_the_patrol.patrol_animal_sounds: Sir... you want to moo at them?
act1_the_patrol.patrol_let_pass: Those papers, sir. If they get back to their CP, they'll know where every DZ is. That's going to hurt us.
act1_the_patrol.patrol_decoy: Who are you sending out there, sir?

act1_the_farmhouse.farmhouse_stack_clear: I'll take point. Standard two-man stack. We clear left on entry.
act1_the_farmhouse.farmhouse_two_element: Malone and I take the front. You cover the back with Doyle.
act1_the_farmhouse.farmhouse_rush: Slow down, Captain. We don't know who's in there. Could be ours.
act1_the_farmhouse.farmhouse_grenade: Sir, that's paratrooper gear on the porch. Those could be our people inside. Hold fire.
act1_the_farmhouse.farmhouse_clicker_outside: Smart. Let the clicker do the talking.
act1_the_farmhouse.farmhouse_scout: Take your time. I'll hold the tree line.
act1_the_farmhouse.farmhouse_skip: Captain, that's paratrooper gear on the porch. Somebody's in there.

act1_scene07.road_scouts_forward: Good call, sir. I'll keep the rest quiet until they signal.
act1_scene07.road_hedgerow_route: Slow but safe. I'll put Malone on rear security.
act1_scene07.road_straight_through: Captain, those tire tracks are fresh. I wouldn't walk into that.
act1_scene07.road_open_field: Sir, there's no cover out there. If there's a patrol...
